english.segment1: I will sing to the Lord. And I will lift my voice. For You have heard my cry
english.segment2: I will sing to the Lord. And I will lift my hands. For You have brought me out of the pit. For You have brought me out of the pit
english.segment3: Chorus: And I'll sing glory, hallelujah. I lift Your name on high. And I'll sing holy, 'cause You're worthy. I'll praise You with the dance
